title: Welcome to Frog Realm! 🐸
content: Frog Realm! 🐸 Embark on a fun crypto journey in a vibrant world where every leap earns you rewards. Collect treasures, upgrade your frog, and compete to become the top frog in the pond. Start hopping now!

title: In-game currency 🪙
content: Frogger Coin is the lifeblood of Frog Realm! 🐸 Earn Frogger Coins by completing quests, winning battles, and exploring the pond. Use them to upgrade your frog, unlock rare items, and dominate the leaderboard!

title: Frog battles ⚔️
content: Collect Frogger Coins to enhance your frog’s skills, unlock special abilities, and customize your look. Join friends for epic challenges, team up for quests, and compete in tournaments to rise to the top of the pond!
